verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> of degrees <WH4609> of David <WH1732>. If <WH3884> it had not been the YY <WH3068> who was on our side, now may Yisra'EL <WH3478> say <WH559> <WH8799>;
If <WH3884> it had not been the YY <WH3068> who was on our side, when men <WH120> rose up <WH6965> <WH8800> against us:
Then <WH233> they had swallowed us up <WH1104> <WH8804> quick <WH2416>, when their wrath <WH639> was kindled <WH2734> <WH8800> against us:
Then <WH233> the waters <WH4325> had overwhelmed <WH7857> <WH8804> us, the stream <WH5158> had gone over <WH5674> <WH8804> our soul <WH5315>:
Then <WH233> the proud <WH2121> waters <WH4325> had gone over <WH5674> <WH8804> our soul <WH5315>.
Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be the YY <WH3068>, who hath not given <WH5414> <WH8804> us as a prey <WH2964> to their teeth <WH8127>.

Our soul <WH5315> is escaped <WH4422> <WH8738> as a bird <WH6833> out of the snare <WH6341> of the fowlers <WH3369> <WH8802>: the snare <WH6341> is broken <WH7665> <WH8738>, and we are escaped <WH4422> <WH8738>.
Our help <WH5828> is in the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068>, who made <WH6213> <WH8802> heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776>.
